title: Bloomberg Markets: Bermuda Emerging Destination for Leisure
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Bermuda Emerging Destination for Leisure
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Stephen King Founder/Owner The Loren Discussing opening Bermuda’s first new hotel in 45 years and forging a new career as a hotelier.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
